title: Text-to-PDF-h2M.pdf
chunk_text:
# Owntrail New Policy Update (2025)
 
 
## 1. Mobile App Features
 
We are excited to announce the launch of the Owntrail Mobile App! - **Download**: Available on iOS and Android stores. - **Login**: Use your existing web credentials.

title: Text-to-PDF-h2M.pdf
chunk_text:
- **Features**: Track orders, chat with support, and manage subscriptions on the go. ## 2. Two-Factor Authentication (2FA)
 
Security is our priority. You can now enable 2FA in your account settings. - Go to **Settings > Security > Enable 2FA**. - We support Google Authenticator and SMS codes.

title: Text-to-PDF-h2M.pdf
chunk_text:
- If you lose your device, contact support with your backup codes. ## 3. Owntrail Rewards Program
 
Earn points for every purchase! - **Earn**: 1 point for every $1 spent. - **Redeem**: 100 points = $5 discount.

title: Text-to-PDF-h2M.pdf
chunk_text:
- **Tiers**:
 
    - **Silver**: 0-500 points
 
    - **Gold**: 500+ points (Free shipping on all orders)
 
 
## 4. Extended Return Policy
 
We have extended our return window from 30 days to **60 days** for all items purchased after 
Nov 1st, 2025. - Items must be unworn and in original packaging.

title: Text-to-PDF-h2M.pdf
chunk_text: - Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days.
